page.title: 01Geography & Geology
page.content: {Start Point}(SX830372) The area is a steeply sided coastal peninsula with a "spiney" ridge of tors;possible periglacially frost shattered outcrops.Head-covered vegetated slopes drop to a modern cliff line.Sections of raised shore platforms are preserved on the northern shore. {Peartree Point}(SX820365) Has good exposures of head,of periglacial origin.Also sea caves. Great Sleaden Rock has a very ecologically rich shore,with extensive laminaria forest,edible crabs & blue rayed limpets. {Great Mattiscombe Sand}(SX817368) A fine example of well preserved raised shore platforms at 4.0 and 7.0 metres.There are two stacks of periglacial head at the West side of the bay, where joints in the.......
